title: China has been stockpiling oil for years. Low prices give it reason to buy more
text: Oil is cheaper right now than it has been in years. That's great news for China — the world's second largest consumer of oil and its biggest importer — which has been building up huge reserves and needs energy to restart its economy.

title: Commodity currencies hold firm on hopes of pandemic peak, oil output cut
text: Commodity currencies drew support on Thursday from hopeful signs the coronavirus pandemic may be peaking and that major oil producers may agree to cut output to stem a plunge in oil prices.

title: S&P 500 Index: Is the Bear Market Rally Almost Over?
text: It’s amazing how markets teach us about fear and greed. The market crash in March saw major stock market indices fall over 35 percent.

title: Stock Market Rally Gains Strength But Not Ruling Out Re-Test
text: Encouraging news on the fight against the coronavirus has helped fuel gains in stocks this week. The S&P 500 Index INDEXSP: .INX has moved to its highest level in a month on the back of broadly-based rallies which saw two days (Monday and today) of upside volume outpacing downside volume by better than 9-to-1.

title: Stock Market Only as Good as Its Lowest Common Denominator

title: Where Has All The Diversification Gone?

title: Excess Money Supply Has Been Like Miracle-Gro For Gold Prices
